attributes.comment:
I understand that there is a proposal to raise USCIS fees -- in particular fees for
I600A forms and biometrics. I am in the process of adopting a child from China. I
completed my I600A form and had my fingerprints taken at this time last year and
paid all appropriate fees. Due to the fact that China is now taking almost two
years to complete the adoption process I am going to have to re-file my I600A
form and be re-fingerprinted. This is not fair but that is what the law says I must
do. But to now increase this fees is putting salt in the wound. I suggest that the
fees remain the same for those people who are re-applying. It is only fair.

Thank you for allowing me to express my views.

Sincerely,

Mary D. Finn
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Mary D. Finn
